div.p: I actually wanted to be a gardener because, as I mentioned earlier, I’ve got severe dyslexia so I’m very hands-on rather than academic
so the school I went to was in a rural part of Cheltenham where there was a lot of trees and forestry and stuff
so where I was so naughty I was able to spend a lot of time out with the caretaker doing stuff with him hands-on so when
I was excluded at 15 I wanted to be a landscape gardener but when I went to Hartpury College and they told me I had
to read all these plants in Latin I decided no it wasn’t for me so I packed it in...
